Usage
=====

Currently, the CLI provides the following-top level commands:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 0
   :caption: Usage:

   authentication
   benchmarks

New commands will be added in the future that will support working with the Virtual Cell Platform's `Model <https://virtualcellmodels.cziscience.com/models>`_ and `Dataset <https://virtualcellmodels.cziscience.com/datasets>`_ entities.
